subject: What's up
body:
Dear {{user.firstName}}

I hope, you're doing great and enjoying the good weather!

Once again, thank you for choosing me as the supervisor for your Master's thesis, I'm sure it's going to be a lot of fun! Regarding that: Do you already have an idea, what the topic's supposed to be? I'm of course giving you complete creative control, but please have a rough research outline ready soon. That way we can keep developing good ideas and do some gooood work.

In other news: My friend Laura, who's the director of the Von-Ranke-Museum, is looking for an intern. It's over summer, so I thought it would be perfect for you. Maybe you'll get some good ideas while working. I told her over dinner last night about your past few papers and she was thrilled to get to know you!

So give her a call and say, who you are, so you can start next Monday.

All the best and talk to you soon

- Alex -
